This Controls the state of cpu cores. Helpful for quickly reducing temperature of Soc and saving some battery in exchange for loss of processing power.
Allows you to tune CPU governor\'s parameters. This tuning \'may\' help improve performance or reduce battery usage(if done right).
This allows users to select which set of cores are used for different types of tasks mentioned below. This may improve performance or battery life depending on your configuration.
This menu consists of display panel settings. allows users to set refresh-rates and turn on various panel features.
This page contains cpu related settings and configuration. Changes made here could have drastic effect on performance and battery.
This page shows various temperature zones and their readings.
This page allows you to change Tcp algorithm which influences your network speed.
This page presents you with power and thermal related settings.
Helped with android app development. Guiding and teaching me with patience
Helped with Ui design and pallet selection for app and finding the right people :)
Implemented Utils tools class and exception handling for shell output handling.
This page contains settings related to Virtual memory and ZRam. these settings control the memory management and have impact on device performance.

#This is a Citrus Lab Script Auto generated By the App.
#Do not edit or use this independently unless you know what your doing.
#The script settings can be edited but at your own risk.

This settings can change your current GPU frequency. Choosing any frequency from this will fix or lock GPU at the chosen frequency.\nIt can be reverted and GPU frequency selection an be handed over to GPU governor by selecting \'Not Selected\' option in choice menu.\nThese frequencies can affect performance of device during gaming sessions.

This settings sets the GPU boost parameters. This boosting of GPU frequency is done relative to current load on GPU.\nMax/Min Frequency sets the highest/lowest frequency the GPU can boost to.\nBoost frequency sets to what specific frequency the GPU is supposed to boost to on GPU Boost event.

This is a driver that manages power. It is responsible for putting device into suspended or low power mode to save battery when inactive.\nThere are few methods it uses to determine weather the device is active or inactive namely \'Hybrid, userSpace, LCD panel, AutoSleep\'.

This is an app service that controls charging behavior of device.

Normal Charge Threshold:-It stops charging when it hits the temperature mentioned here.

Fast Charge Threshold:-It suspends fastCharge and switches to normal charge speeds when it hits the mentioned temperature.

This is an Citrus specific driver that limits CPU performance when the device screen is off. It is used to reduce heating and potentially save power especially when tethered to a PC.\nChoosing from low-High sets how aggressive the driver should be in clamping CPU frequencies.

These settings allows you to control ZRam behaviour.
ZRam is a virtual memory created that speeds up disk transfer and improves app multitasking especially when ram space is running low.

ZRam disk size sets the size of the swap file.

Zram algorithm sets the desired algorithm for swap logic.

Swappiness sets how often should the memory be swapped(very high values will slow down device).

These settings allow you to control the virtual memory behaviour.

min free kbytes:-This is used to force the Linux VM to keep a minimum number of kilobytes free.

Extra free Kbytes:-This parameter tells the VM to keep extra free memory between the threshold where background reclaim (kswapd) kicks in.

Dirty ratio:-is the absolute maximum amount of system memory that can be filled with dirty pages before everything must get committed to disk.

VFS cache pressure:-VFS cache pressure motivates code in the kernel to return memory being used for caching to the general pool of free memory.

These profiles are pre made settings that will be applied. they are made for Realme X7 Max/ Mtk D1200. There are three profiles. 

Power is used for saving power it reduces performance and responsiveness to save battery.

Balance improves responsiveness while still trying to conserve battery.

Performance pulls all gpu and cpu to highest settings and is least bothered about saving power and is ideal for gaming.

These set of toggles helps you to import custom script or add current settings. Users can do the required changes in settings in app and once done during the same session you can generate script from current changes and use that as a profile.

Or users can import custom scripts and apply them on the go.

'Set On Boot' option allows users to select a custom profile they want to apply when device boots up.
Selecting 'Not selected' clears any profile that is set to execute on boot.
